description:
Fed up with her circumstances at the Demon Castle, Princess Syalis goes to great lengths to add luxuries to her castle prison.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Die Prinzessin, die Vernichtung und ein kleines Abenteuer
Hime to Hakai to Chiisana Bouken
The Princess, Destruction, and a Short Journey
姫と破壊と小さな冒険
